snippet: After months of uncertainty, federal authorities now say some new derivatives rules will not take effect until Jan. 1, providing a brief — but important — extension to Wall Street.
abstract: After months of uncertainty, federal authorities now say some new derivatives rules will not take effect until Jan. 1, providing a brief — but important — extension to Wall Street.

headline.main: Regulators Clarify Timing of New Derivatives Rules

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
